localised_text.tooltip_text: Great Drill of Hashut||View mission locations and artefacts that will progress the Great Drill towards the Blood of Hashut.
Great Drill of Hashut||[[col:red]]You must complete the first Drill mission to access this panel.[[/col]]
{{tr:treasury_header}}||View a summary of your trade and finances.
Labour Economy||View and manage the Labour population in each of your provinces.
Labour Economy||View and manage the Labour population in each of your provinces.\n\n[[col:red]]The Labour Economy panel is locked until you own two or more provinces[[/col]].
Enter Khorne realm immediately||Useful for testing cinematics and audio etc.
Enter Nurgle realm immediately||Useful for testing cinematics and audio etc.
Enter Slaanesh realm immediately||Useful for testing cinematics and audio etc.
Enter Tzeentch realm immediately||Useful for testing cinematics and audio etc.

_0.tooltip: [[col:green]][[img:icon_devotion]][[/img]]Devotion is in supply. There is no chance of a Chaos incursion appearing in your land.[[/col]]

_1.tooltip: [[col:yellow]][[img:icon_devotion]][[/img]]Devotion is low! There is a small chance of a Chaos incursion appearing in your land soon.[[/col]]

_2.tooltip: [[col:orange]][[img:icon_devotion]][[/img]]Devotion is still low! There is a medium chance of a Chaos incursion appearing in your land soon.[[/col]]

_3.tooltip: [[col:red]][[img:icon_devotion]][[/img]]Devotion is still low! There is a high chance of a Chaos incursion appearing in your land soon.[[/col]]

full_threat_effect.componentleveltooltip: The attack on the Great Bastion has started! Additional Chaos reinforcements will arrive while the threat remains full.

motherland_ritual_effect.comment: This needs to always be visible for kislev faction so that the winter animation goes to the correct place (otherwise goes on the left side of the resource bar for some reason)

dy_income.componentleveltooltip: Total upkeep from Gifts of Chaos

empty_slot.componentleveltooltip: Bound Artefact Slot||Once attained, Ancestor Relics you choose to use for the Great Drill will appear here.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (provinces = ProvinceList.Filter(ExWorkload.Total > 0)) => {provinces.IsEmpty == false | Format("%d%%", RoundFloat(provinces.Sum(100 - ExEfficiency.Total) / provinces.Size)) | "-"}

property.name: red
property.value: (provinces = ProvinceList.Filter(ExWorkload.Total > 0)) => provinces.IsEmpty == false && RoundFloat(provinces.Sum(100 - ExEfficiency.Total) / provinces.Size) < 50

property.name: yellow
property.value: (provinces = ProvinceList.Filter(ExWorkload.Total > 0)) => provinces.IsEmpty == false && RoundFloat(provinces.Sum(100 - ExEfficiency.Total) / provinces.Size) > 49 && RoundFloat(provinces.Sum(100 - ExEfficiency.Total) / provinces.Size) < 100
